pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life Gut Relief 14 Sachets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This great tasting formula combines the Prebiotics Acacia and Pectin with Glutamine, Globe Artichoke and Slippery Elm to help support gut lining integrity and maintain healthy digestive function. It also contains Meriva®, a patented form of curcumin.

Suitable For: Suitable for vegetarians.

Size: 14 sachets

Flavour: Mango/orange

Serving Size: 6g

KEY FEATURES

• With Slippery Elm, Glutamin & Prebiotics
• Supports healthy digestive function and relieves indigestion

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Not recommended for use by pregnant and lactating women. Drink plenty of water.

Ingredients

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Wheat

Directions

RECOMMENDED ADULT DOSAGE: Take 1 level scoop (6g) once daily before a meal, dissolve in 150ml of chilled water or as recommended by your healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place below 30°C.
